Controls 

You will find a How To in the main menu, but keep in mind that it is not fully update yet. For example, the space bar does nothing, and you can not jump with it.

When Finished 

We would be very happy if you took your time to answer a small survey to help us make the game better :) You can find it by clicking HERE :)
